title: List All Entities
description: The paginated API is used to query for multiple entities. You can apply _filters_ through the query parameter to search for specific entities.

page.description: The number of the page that will be returned.

limit.description: The number of resources per page.

id.description: The entity id to be retrieved.

address.description: The address for which entities are to be retrieved.

publicKey.description: The public key for which entities are to be retrieved.

isResigned.description: The flag to indicate that resigned entites should be retrieved.

type.description: The type of entities to be retrieved.

subType.description: The sub-type of entities to be retrieved.

data.name.description: The name of the entities to be retrieved.

data.ipfsData.description: The IPFS Hash of the entities to be retrieved.
